metadata.name: Kavremover Dropped Binary LOLBIN Usage
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a signed binary dropped by Kaspersky Lab Products Remover (kavremover) which can be abused as a LOLBIN to execute arbitrary commands and binaries.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' run run-cmd ')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\cleanapi.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\kavremover.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a signed binary dropped by Kaspersky Lab Products Remover (kavremover) which can be abused as a LOLBIN to execute arbitrary commands and binaries.
